name: Memories from Another Life
description: Seeing a poppy in an item frame reminds you of something, you're not quite sure what, but it makes your heart tingle.

actions.command: execute at @s if entity @e[type = item_frame, nbt = {Item: {id: "minecraft:poppy"}}, distance = ..3] run effect give @s minecraft:regeneration 1 0 true
execute at @s if entity @e[type = glow_item_frame, nbt = {Item: {id: "minecraft:poppy"}}, distance = ..3] run effect give @s minecraft:regeneration 1 0 true
